sentences.en: a good understanding of politics in China
sentences.cn: 对中国政治很好的了解

sentences.en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
sentences.cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

sentences.en: He closed down the business and went into politics.
sentences.cn: 他关闭公司投身政治。

sentences.en: He grandly declared that "international politics is a struggle for power".
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地宣称“国际政治是一场权力之争”。

sentences.en: He remains a towering figure in modern British politics.
sentences.cn: 他在现代英国政坛上一直是位杰出的人物。

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: I assume her politics must be fairly conservative.
sentences.cn: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

sentences.en: John Major has reached the pinnacle of British politics.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰已攀上了英国政界的顶峰。

sentences.en: modern American politics
sentences.cn: 现代美国政治

sentences.en: Now politics is all about the right haircut and a sharp suit.
sentences.cn: 现在政界讲究的无非是合适的发型和时髦的衣着。

sentences.en: Oh I'm not political, I take no interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 噢，我不关心政治，对政治一点也不感兴趣。

sentences.en: Politics have always interested Anita.
sentences.cn: 阿妮塔一直对政治感兴趣。

sentences.en: Schmidt continued to expound his views on economics and politics.
sentences.cn: 施密特继续阐述他的经济和政治观点。

sentences.en: She changed the face of British politics almost single-handed.
sentences.cn: 她几乎是一手改变了英国政治的面貌。

sentences.en: The film takes no position on the politics of Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 这部电影未在北爱尔兰政治问题上选择站边。

sentences.en: The report suggested that the same trend was at work in politics.
sentences.cn: 这份报告表明，同一趋势也在影响着政治。

sentences.en: Their success does not necessarily reflect a leftward shift in politics.
sentences.cn: 他们的成功并不一定表示政治气候转向亲左。

sentences.en: These obscure groups were of little account in national politics.
sentences.cn: 这些名不见经传的团体在国内政界无足轻重。

sentences.en: They're trying to figure out the politics of this whole situation.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图弄明白整个情形背后的权术争斗。

sentences.en: Tom is studying for a degree in politics.
sentences.cn: 汤姆正在攻读政治学学位。

words.tran_cn: 进行政治活动；谈论政治

phrases.tran_cn: 新政治（由麦高文、麦卡锡等美国总统候选人提出的强调选民参与的政治）
玩弄政治手腕，玩弄权术
世界政治；国际政治；世界政治季刊

trans.tran_cn: 政治，权术，政治信仰，政治学，手腕
trans.tran_en: ideas and activities relating to gaining and using power in a country, city etc
